entry.title: Dynamic Forms in Grafana using Data Manipulation panel

group.title: Dynamic Forms in Grafana using Data Manipulation panel
group.description: We created the Data Manipulation plugin for Grafana to make sending data back into a connected data source possible. This functionality opens the door to a new universe of use cases with great potential to convert your dashboard into a full-scale web application. Become a member of our fan club https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQadniwbukI6ZmTN2oTTb-g/join and earn loyalty badges! entry.title: Device Management using Grafana dashboard and Data Manipulation panel #grafana #nvidia #controlpanel

group.title: Device Management using Grafana dashboard and Data Manipulation panel #grafana #nvidia #controlpanel
group.description: Most of the time, Grafana is considered as a superb system monitoring and observability tool. However, Grafana has much more to offer. In addition to beautiful and informative dashboards, Grafana is capable of process control. Two simple words hide the whole application universe behind them. Technically, process control means sending data back from the dashboard into a data source. Strategically, that could mean converting your dashboard into a full-scale web application. Blog post: https://volkovlabs.io/blog/form-panel-device-management-20240424/ Become a member of our fan club https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQadniwbukI6ZmTN2oTTb-g/join and earn loyalty badges! group.title: Base64 Image/Media panel 5.0.0 for Grafana #grafana #image #plugins #opensource #community
group.description: Base64 Image/Video/Audio/PDF panel 5.0.0 is here! Check out the blog post for details: https://volkovlabs.io/blog/image-panel-5.0.0-20240326/ The Base64 Image/Video/Audio/PDF visualization panel is a plugin for Grafana that displays Base64 encoded files in PNG, JPG, GIF, MP4, WEBM, MP3, OGG, and PDF formats. entry.title: Metrics, Logs, CPU Usage with BIG Alerting in Grafana | Unscripted and Hands-On

group.title: Metrics, Logs, CPU Usage with BIG Alerting in Grafana | Unscripted and Hands-On
group.description: The idea of the BI(G) was born from a bare necessity to simplify everyday work for data analysts and project managers with profound expertise in their subject area but not in the LGTM stack. How to monitor metrics, logs, and CPU usage with Prometheus using the Business Intelligence App 1.6.0. GitHub repository: https://github.com/VolkovLabs/volkovlabs-bi-grafana Become a member of our fan club https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQadniwbukI6ZmTN2oTTb-g/join and earn loyalty badges! CHAPTERS 0:00 Intro 0:20 Download the BIG from GitHub. The BIG folder structure 1:40 The BIG look in Grafana 2:03 Business Intelligence Demo dashboard 3:03 Create an alert action 5:08 Alert statuses 5:34 More alert details 6:22 Create an alert rule 8:42 Create a service account and use the token 10:33 Engine Monitoring dashboard (using alerts plus variables) 15:51 Important comments on annotations 16:28 Alert History panel DISCOVER Documentation: https://docs.volkovlabs.io Blog: https://blog.volkovlabs.io GitHub: https://github.com/VolkovLabs GET IN TOUCH Issues and questions: https://github.com/VolkovLabs GitHub Sponsor: https://github.com/sponsors/VolkovLabs LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/volkovlabs #Grafana #GrafanaPlugins #Visualization #visualizaci贸n
